### Citing ggVolcanoR

Mullan, K. A. et al. ggVolcanoR: A Shiny app for customizable visualization of differential expression datasets. Comput Struct Biotechnol J 19, 5735-5740, doi:10.1016/j.csbj.2021.10.020 (2021).
